devdoc.author: Compound
devdoc.details: This contract must be poked via the `drip()` function every so often.

params.dripRate_: Numer of wcantos per block to drip

drip().details: Note: this will only drip up to the amount of wcantos available.

returns._0: The amount of wcantos dripped in this call

devdoc.title: Reservoir Contract

drip().notice: Drips the maximum amount of wcantos to match the drip rate since inception

dripRate().notice: wcantos per block that to drip to target (immutable)

dripStart().notice: The block number when the Reservoir started (immutable)

dripped().notice: Amount that has already been dripped

userdoc.notice: Distributes a wcanto to a different contract at a fixed rate.
